description:
Learn Piano with Rosa - Rosa's Piano Online School - Teaching 32 Courses!

OVER 10,000 Successful students have already taken my piano online courses since July 2014 with 231 - 5 Star Reviews

Course Updated: November 15, 2015

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Read Music Notes Fast Level 3 - Speed Read 11 Treble Clef Notes with Increasing speed

Would you like to increase your sight reading skill in 22 Music Notes?

45 BPM - Very Slow

76 BPM – Walking Pace

92 BPM – Moderate Speed

120 BPM – Lively & Fast Speed

200 BPM – For Super Genius

As you follow along in this Read Music Notes Fast Level 3, you will find out at what speed you are able to read music. If you are slow, after the program, you should be able to reach at super fast speed, hopefully even at genius level.

What you need are:

1. A Method that works, thus my Note Attack Method! - Level 1

2. Know how to apply my method to all 22 Music Notes and read them with accuracy! - Level 2

3. A Program to help you increase music note reading speed - Level 3 to 5

*********************************************

I have now designed a Read Music Notes Fast with Speed Program for the Passionate music learners:

1. Read Music Notes Fast Level 3 - Speed Read 11 Treble Clef Notes

2. Read Music Notes Fast Level 4 - Speed Read 11 Bass Clef Notes

3. Read Music Notes Fast Level 5 - Speed Read 22 Treble & Bass Clef Music Notes

These Programs are designed to help you overcome all fear of reading music notes. By the end of the program, you will be able to read 22 music notes fast at a fast speed at 120 BPM.

*************************************************

Read Music Notes Fast Level 3 concentrates on Speed Read 11 Treble Clef Music Notes

  • you will be able to read 11 Treble Clef Music notes with ease
  • you will be able to identify the notes by calling out the names
  • you do not need to count any lines
  • you do not need to count any spaces
  • you read the notes not by memory
  • you read the notes just like how you call your friends name


After this program, you will be able to read simple lead sheets and sight read. Many fake books have the treble clef melody tones written out. After this program, you will be able to play these right hand melody notes with your musical instrument, be it piano, ukulele, guitar.


In this course, we will move from very slow to super speed.

A. Introduction

1. Rosa's Unique Method - Music Note Attack & Say It Method

2. Read Music Notes Fast - Understand Different Tempo in Music

B. Read 3 Treble Clef Music Notes - E B A (Lines)

Slow Level - 45 BPM, 76 BPM, 92 BPM

Fast Level - 120 BPM & 220 BPM

C. Read 6 Treble Clef Music Notes - C E G B D F (Lines)

Slow Level - 45 BPM, 76 BPM, 92 BPM

Fast Level - 120 BPM & 220 BPM

D. Read 5 Treble Clef 5 Music Notes - D F A C E (Spaces)

Slow Level - 45 BPM, 76 BPM, 92 BPM

Fast Level - 120 BPM & 220 BPM

E. Read 11 Treble Clef Music Notes - C D E F G A B C D E F (Lines & Spaces)

Slow Level - 45 BPM, 76 BPM, 92 BPM

Fast Level - 120 BPM & 220 BPM

F. Read 11 Treble Clef Music Notes - Whole Notes

Slow Level - 45 BPM, 76 BPM, 92 BPM

Fast Level - 120 BPM & 220 BPM

G. Read 11 Treble Clef Music Notes - Quarter Notes

Slow Level - 45 BPM, 76 BPM, 92 BPM

Fast Level - 120 BPM & 220 BPM

H. Read 11 Treble Clef Music Notes - Mixture of Whole notes, Half notes, Quarter notes

Slow Level - 45 BPM, 76 BPM, 92 BPM

Fast Level - 120 BPM & 220 BPM

Students are having lots of fun finding their speed and increasing. Come on in and join us,

Rosa


***************************************************************************
